nodes.text: The Yarith sector was a subsector of the Greater Javin of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. It shared a border with the Anoat sector, home of the Ivax and Kiax Nebulae; as such, the two sectors were often collectively referred to as the "Twin Nebulae Sectors."

The Yarith sector was first mentioned in "Galactic Gazetteer: Hoth and the Greater Javin" and "Rough and Tundra," Wizards of the Coast web supplements for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game of Star Wars Legends. The two articles were written by Craig Robert Carey, Jason Fry, and Daniel Wallace, and they were published on March 25, 2004. On December 14, 2015, the Yarith sector was canonized by The Art of Star Wars: Uprising, a concept art book relating to Star Wars: Uprising, a mobile-game set within the Anoat sector.
